home.title: Find the perfect artisan for your home projects
home.subtitle: ArtisanLink directly connects individuals in need of home services with qualified professionals. Simplify your search for artisans and get quotes quickly.
home.feature1Desc: Quickly find the artisan that matches your needs thanks to our advanced search and filter system.
home.feature2Desc: All our artisans are qualified and rated by the community. Check reviews and experiences from other clients.
home.feature3Desc: As an artisan, receive new project opportunities regularly and grow your business.
home.feature4Desc: Contact artisans directly, exchange easily and get personalized quotes in just a few clicks.
home.missionText: ArtisanLink is an innovative web platform that directly connects individuals in need of home services with qualified professionals. Our mission is to simplify the search for artisans while offering professionals a regular source of new opportunities.
home.ctaSubtitle: Join ArtisanLink today and discover a new way to find or offer home services.
